name: Movimento difesa del cittadino
memberOrga: MDC avails itself of a legal counselling department and is organized into departments that oversee Association activities and deal with specific issues. There are over 100 local offices distributed in 20 regions, that offer advice and assistance to members in the controversies with the PA, with public and private service providers, with contracts, bills, etc. The MDC local sites can be consulted at this link: http://www.difesadelcittadino.it/le-nostre-sedi/
goal:
Movimento Difesa del Cittadino (MDC) is a national association of consumers’ protection and aid, recognized by Italian actual Ministry of Economical Development) according to Consumers Code D.lgs 206/05, member of CNCU (Italian National Committee of Consumers and Users).
Starting from 1987, MDC works to promote protection of citizens’ rights, trough information and giving them legal instruments for self-defence, furnishing also assistance and tutelage trough experts.
In particular, our social purpose is to undertake any cultural, social, political, educational, legal and judicial activity aimed at the promotion, implementation and protection of the interests and rights of the citizen, with particular reference to those who are in weakness or disadvantaged, because of physical, psychological, economic, social or family conditions, political or religious beliefs, and against disparities and forms of violence or persecution against women, children, the sick, the disabled, the foreigners.
To combat all forms of illicit, abusive, deprivation, crime and violence committed against citizens, consumers, users and taxpayers, the association carries out the actions to pursue:
- Health protection;
- products and services safety and quality;
- dequate information and correct advertising to the consumer;
- the exercise of commercial practices in accordance with principles of good faith, fairness and loyalty; E) education for consumption;
- transparency and fairness in contractual relations concerning goods and services;
- the promotion and development of free, voluntary and democratic association between consumers and users;
- the provision of public services in accordance with quality standards
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Banking and financial services, Business and Industry, Climate Action, Communication, Competition, Consumers, Culture and media, Digital economy and society, Economy, finance and the euro, Education and training, Energy, Food Safety, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Public Health, Taxation, Youth
euInitiatives:
Consumer affairs at EU level is the main topic followed by MDC.
In particular, on the 2nd of August 2017 MDC has participated in the Public consultation on the targeted revision of EU consumer law directives.
On the 2nd of February 2016, MDC has participated in the survey about the empowering the national competition authorities to be more effective enforcers.
On the 15th of February 2016, MDC has also presented to the EU Commission a legal opinion on regarding the notification received by the EU Commission on the proposed merger between the two Italian telephone operators H3G S.p.A. ("H3G") and WIND Telecommunications S.p.A ("WIND").
